      • createBan

        public MongoBan createBan(java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String reason,
                          boolean steam,
                          boolean banned)
        Creates an unsaved MongoBan document.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Ban.
        username - The user-name of the Player.
        reason - The reason for the Ban.
        steam - True if the Ban is SteamID. False if the Ban is I.P. Address.
        banned - Flag to set the ban.
        Returns:
        Returns the created MongoBan.
